title: Report on British hovercraft
creator_credit: Derek Stewart Productions, Gerard Bryant and British Petroleum
brief_description: A report on British hovercraft and the capabilities and achievements of various types. Principal operational and technical features of these craft are explained, and the survey shows the operation of passenger services with the Westland SRN 2, and the development of the British-Norman CC2 for commercial operation.
